name: Wizard Cat
description:
Play in VR with an Xbox controller to explore the island and experience flying in the sky.

Needed a Controller otherwise will not be able to rotate the camera. Best to play with a VR headset.

Controller:

Left joystick to rotate the camera; Right joystick to move; A to continue to talk; Y to jump; B to switch walking/flying mode. Move your head in VR headset to control the camera.

Key Board Control:

ASWD to move; Space to jump; Right Shift to switch walking/flying mode.

The game was inspired by another game called "A Short Hike", I and the other two team members worked on this game on the second semester of our second year of game design class.
